Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This exceptional piece is not just an item; it's a testament to innovation and quality that stands the test of time. Given its unique features and unparalleled craftsmanship, we believe its true value exceeds $15000. Considering the immense value this product offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you for $20000. This is an opportunity to acquire a masterpiece at a premium price, reflecting its extraordinary attributes. Should you choose to accept this offer, I assure you that you will be investing in something truly remarkable. If you have any questions or require more information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of bringing this product into your collection. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $20,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $20,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
